text: Lev B. Levitin is a Russian-American engineer currently a Distinguished Professor at Boston University and a Life Fellow of the IEEE. His current research interests include information theory, physical aspects of computation, complex systems and quantum measurement. He is known for the Margolus–Levitin theorem. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Boston University faculty Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Russian engineers Category:American electrical engineers
title: Lev Levitin
